resources.string: As of May 25th, 2018, GDPR, also known as the General Data Protection Regulation, takes effect. This law is for the general protection of data and privacy for all individuals within the EU. By \'Consenting\' you are allowing this application to utilize your personal data, if applicable, for purposes such as, but not exclusive to personalized advertisements. By \'Not Consenting\' you are not allowing vendors to utilize your personal data for these purposes.
You can give consent on a line-by-line basis by checking/unchecking the boxes. The following is a list of data usage purposes followed by a list of the official advertising partners.
